text: Cinnamomum subavenium is an evergreen tree from South and East Asia that can become tall. Leaves of Cinnamomum subavenium are an important spice. It is also a Chinese herb that has been suggested for use as a skin whitening agent. The plant contains substances which inhibit production of tyrosinase an enzyme which catalyzes the production of melanin. The herb has not been established as either effective or safe but is being researched by Hui-Min Wang and his colleagues at Kaohsiung Medical University in Taiwan where experiments shown that it was effective at causing zebrafish to lose their stripes. ==References== subavenium Category:Trees of China Category:Flora of tropical Asia Category:Trees of Taiwan
title: Cinnamomum subavenium
